CSSValue.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The CSSValue interface represents the current computed value of a CSS property.

blockquote.para:
This interface was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSValueCssText.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The cssText property of the
interface represents the current computed CSS property value.

blockquote.para:
This property was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSValueCssText.value: A string representing the current CSS property value.

CSSValueCssValueType.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The cssValueType read-only property of the
interface represents the type of the current computed CSS
property value.

blockquote.para:
This property was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSValueCssValueType.value:
An unsigned short representing a code defining the type of the value.
Possible values are:
